mapper.insert: insert into orders(number, status, user_id, address_book_id, order_time, checkout_time, pay_method, pay_status, amount, remark, phone, address, user_name, consignee, cancel_reason, rejection_reason, cancel_time, estimated_delivery_time, delivery_status, delivery_time, pack_amount, tableware_number, tableware_status) VALUE (#{number}, #{status},#{userId},#{addressBookId},#{orderTime},#{checkoutTime},#{payMethod}, #{payStatus},#{amount},#{remark},#{phone},#{address},#{userName},#{consignee},#{cancelReason}, #{rejectionReason},#{cancelTime},#{estimatedDeliveryTime},#{deliveryStatus}, #{deliveryTime},#{packAmount},#{tablewareNumber},#{tablewareStatus})
mapper.update:
update orders
cancel_reason=#{cancelReason},
rejection_reason=#{rejectionReason},
cancel_time=#{cancelTime},
pay_status=#{payStatus},
pay_method=#{payMethod},
checkout_time=#{checkoutTime},
status = #{status},
delivery_time = #{deliveryTime}
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select od.name, sum(od.number) sum_number from order_detail od, orders o where o.status = 5 and od.order_id = o.id and order_time > #{begin} and order_time < #{end} group by od.name order by sum_number desc limit 0, 10
